text: Abbas Hassan (born 1 July 1978) is a former Iraqi football forward who played for Iraq in the 2002 FIFA World Cup qualification. He played for the national team between 2001 and 2003.http://niiiis.com/players3.htmlhttp://www.rsssf.com/miscellaneous/iraq- recintlp.html On 21 April 2001, Abbas scored his first two goals against Macau.https://web.archive.org/web/20020620000824/http://iraqsport.com/cgi- bin/db/db.cgi?db=players&uid;=default&view;_records=1&ID;=*&nh;=25 ==Career statistics== ===International goals=== Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
